name: Noddy's Magic Adventure
description:
Journey into this magical adventure with Noddy to search for the Wizards' missing magic wand. Help Noddy discover the mystery of the strange happenings in Toyland - can he get the wand back from those naughty goblins who are casting mischievous spells?
The racing cars are driving by themselves! Help Noddy drive in his car close enough to the speeding cars and say a magic spell to stop them.
The goblins have taken all the batteries out of the robots and now they don't work. Put the batteries back in so the robots can continue building a space rocket.
The goblins made the balls bounce high in the sky - and stay there! Fly in the aeroplane and use some magic dust to bring them down to earth again.
Step-stone across the stream to rescue Bumpy Dog after the goblins turned the bridge into Jelly with the magic wand. Use the stones to cross the stream.

name: Alpha Mission
description: Alpha Mission was developed by SNK and G1M2 for the Famicom and Nintendo Entertainment System after success as an Arcade installation. It is a vertical scrolling shooter that has similarities to Xevious, with the use of air-to-air and air-to-ground weapons.

name: Luigi and the Island of Mystery
description: Luigi decides to set off on his very own adventure when he encounters a strange island. Bowser is already here. Can the green plumber stop his evil plans? Luigi and the Island of Mystery is a full-fledged romhack featuring an expansive platforming journey, some remixed mechanics from the original Super Mario World, and several cameos!

name: American Gladiators
description:
American Gladiators is licensed from the popular TV show of the same name. It features a series of events testing players' strength, speed and skill against a trained team of ten 'Gladiators', five male and five female. The female characters are Ice, Gold, Lace, Blaze and Zap, most of whom are known for their bodybuilding achievements. Main male characters are Turbo, Nitro (who was featured in several television commercials for American television), Gemini, Thunder and Laser (Mr. Montana of 1986).

In total there are seven events, all viewed from third-person views. The final one is the Eliminator assault course, in which you compete directly against an opponent.

name: Argus
description: Argus is a vertical shooter by Jaleco and conversion of an arcade game originally released in 1986. The players takes control of a space-fighter equipped with a front laser gun and ground bombs. Although the game features power-ups, they follow an unusual and unique formula - tiles on the ground must be destroyed in order to upgrade the main weapon or trigger special events. However, three of these tiles must be destroyed to activate such power-ups - B creates a temporary barrier around the ship,P upgrades the primary weapon and L gives the player an extra bonus at the end of each stage. Another interesting twist to the game is the Uoru armor; a shadow sometimes appear on the ground and if the player aligns his own shadow with it, then the ship transforms into a powerful robot for a short amount of time. Each stage ends with the same boss battle; a large Mega Argus fortress with a slow flashing core at its center, and the only way to destroy this pernicious mothership is to bomb its core when it is fully exposed. After the boss is taken care of, the player must successfully land on a runway and be cautious not to crash the ship. Argus features nine levels and includes a two-player alternating option.

name: Hidden Gems of Bermuda 2
description: Have you ever wanted to travel to a tropical island and explore the natural and cultural wonders? Well now you can, and you can do it all from the comfort of your own home! Hidden Gems of Bermuda 2 continues the exploration that began in the first game, taking you across the island through mini games, puzzles, mazes and more.

name: Boost Beginner
description: This game is a modified version of Cave Story, and is targeted at players who have played around with the original and are more experienced.

name: Arkanoid
description:
NES port of Arkanoid.

The original Breakout concept involves controlling a bat at the bottom of the screen and using it to catch and direct a ball so as to hit all the bricks which are arranged at the top of the screen. It was unpopular for over a decade, before Taito revived it with some new ideas in this arcade game. The game's plot redefines the bat as a Vaus spaceship, the ball as an energy bolt, and the bricks form a mysterious wall stopping the ship from progressing to safety. By the mid-80s, power-ups were popular in most types of arcade games, and Arkanoid features them. They are caught by positioning the bat below them as they fall (meaning that you risk missing the ball if you go for them at the wrong time). The power-ups include lasers (which are mounted to each side of the ship and allow you to shoot out the blocks), a catching device (so as to be able to fire the ball off at a different angle every time you hit it) and one that slows the bolt down.

description: Unleash voxel warfare in 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far. Lead a modern military, build bases, unlock units, and attack in all-out war. Engage on land, sea and air in over 30 missions, online skirmishes, or co-op. Easy to learn, a challenge to master.

name: Arkanoid
description: Arkanoid is the official Coco version of the arcade hit of the same name. It is a Bustout type game, except much more advanced. Steve Bjork brought out a Bustout style game from his own company called Bash a little bit earlier, that introduced the bricks that have to be hit more than once, indestructable bricks, and brick that drop special energizers (like fat paddle, slow ball speed, magnetic paddle, etc.), but he didn't take it as far as the official Arkanoid, until this version sold on cartridge through Radio Shack came out. Then, he added the aliens coming onto the playing board from the top, and the laser powerup where you can shoot the blocks.

name: Awakening
description:
After the epic horrors of DOOM and The Beginning of the End parts I and II you are a broken man. Demons haunt your mind and plague your sleep. Unable to cope, you are sent to a UAC medical facility that also happens to double as a radioactive toxic waste treatment plant. Here, along with the few other surviving scarred space marines, you are prescribed cryno-therapy. Your body is placed in suspended animation while your mind is flushed with chemicals and stimulants in order to cleanse the horrors from your psyche.
But something is wrong. As soon as you are put into stasis, you awaken again. Things are different. The building seems deserted and in shambles. No sounds are heard. You step out of your chrinochamber to a familiar smell. The smell of rancid flesh. The smell of death. You draw your pistol, which you never let leave your side no matter what the circumstances. You wonder if this nightmare will ever be over. You get the sense the worst is only beginning.

name: 2048 Units of /vr/
description: This project contains 32 maps in the main wad, plus an additional 6 that didn't make the cut contained in the extra wad. Inspired by projects like MAYhem 2048 and Congestion 1024, we sought to make a project with similar restrictions: make a boom-compatible map where the playable areas are within a 2048x2048 unit space and optionally use textures from gothictx.

name: Doom 404
description:
DOOM 404 is a 32-level, vanilla-compatible (complevel 2) megawad. Every map was built with 404 lines or fewer, as a nod to the project name, to keep the map design focused on the key concept for each level.

It's a sad life on the Space Marine IT Help Desk. Especially when you're stuck on the graveyard shift. Night after night of "Did you try rebooting?" Not exactly what you expected when you signed up.
You figured this call would be more of the same: some garbled voice mail about "gremlins in the system". Gremlins? Seriously, how old is the guy who left that? Ninety five? He probably remembers vacuum tubes.
Now you're here though, something isn't right. This facility should be busy, but it's silent. Almost desolate. You're starting to feel glad you brought that popgun they issued you with to make you look like a real soldier ...

name: Athena
description: In this action-adventure game, players embark on a mythical journey as Athena, the Goddess of Wisdom, who leaves her castle to explore the perilous Fantasy World beyond. As you navigate through diverse environments, from sky to sea, you'll face an array of strange and formidable creatures. Discover and wield various weapons, including a ball and chain, bow and arrow, and a powerful sword to combat your foes. The game offers unique gameplay elements, allowing Athena to transform into different forms - donning wings to soar through the skies or becoming a mermaid to delve into ocean depths. This blend of Greek mythology, shape-shifting abilities, and varied combat creates an engaging and fantastical gaming experience.

name: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes
description: Attack of the Killer Tomatoes was released for Game Boy in 1992 and although it uses the same cover as the original NES game, it is not a port of that version. The Game Boy version was developed by Equilibrium and published by THQ in Europe and the US. It was also released in Japan, where it was published by Altron in 1993.

When chosen by fate, you will need to command these Senki to fight in a world ruled by dark forces.

This is a battle that belongs to fate, lead these Senki girls to rise up and stop the world from going to ruin.

description: A visual novel centered on university student Maddie as she encounters various mysteries and the characters involved in them.

name: Vectris
description: Vectris is your typical blocks and lines type puzzle game. The game is complete however, it does suffer from some screen flicker. A Vectrex side effect of drawing too many vectors on screen at once

name: More Invaders!
description: More Invaders! is the sequel to Vector Vaders. It's how John wanted VV to look originally, but due to his lack of Vectrex programming experience at the time, couldn't make it so. More Invaders! has practically no screen flicker and plays very fast (compared to its predecessor), and has some enhanced features, such as splitting Invaders, trick saucers and special bonuses!

name: Terasene The Light of Her Life
description:
In this unique defense game, you take control of the sun to guard a young lady on her nighttime stroll. Except this young lady just so happens to turn to ash in the sunlight. So you'd better be careful where you're pointing those rays!

Control the direction of the sun's rays to drive off monsters who approach the girl. The sun will rotate right while the screen is being touched, and rotate left when you release your finger. Be careful not to shine light on the girl while her parasol is down, or she'll take damage. Her damage will heal over time, but if you continue to shine light on her, she'll turn to ash and you'll get a Game Over.

name: Duludubi Star
description: A promotional 3D platformer released in 2008 that ties in to FantaWild's theme parks. The game has you control Duludubi, a blue dinosaur who's one of the company's mascots, as he ventures through 5 themed worlds to save his sister, Duluduni, from the evil Dr. Octopus.

name: Guess The Movie: Film Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft vs. Zombies 2
description:
(MvZ2) is a fan game of Minecraft, Plants vs Zombies and Touhou Project, it is developed solely by Cuerzor.

The game features mechanics from Plants vs Zombies, elements from Minecraft and Touhou Project’s setting and characters. Players take on the role of Steve the mechanic as he travels to Gensokyo with his friend Crazy Villager to solve the Minecraft incident.

name: Beast Mode: Night of the Werewolf Silver Bullet Edition
description: Unleash your inner beast, rack up epic kills, and dominate the leaderboards in this over-the-top Arcade Action spectacle!

name: JFCBP1
description: JFCBP1 is the first Community Build Project to make use of the extended map limits given by the JonoF/EDuke32 ports - so of course one of either is required to play

name: JFCBP2
description: A community build project utilising Jonof port's new build limits to make a bigger and more detailed map. The aliens have taken over a moon base and it's up to Duke to terminate their occupation with extreme prejudice.

name: Gothams Industrial District
description: From the author of the I.C.E. addon and following in the same hi-tech slash industrial fashion, Gotham's Industrial District is an extensive network of buildings with various industrial purposes - from pumping stations to courtyards, to plain old generic structures full of bleeping computer equipment.

name: Lively Chair Simulator
description: This game has slightly strange controls. By controlling each leg of the chair individually, you can make the chair walk, run, and even jump. It also supports online multiplayer games with 6 types of chairs to choose from and 3 modes.

name: Duet Night Abyss
description: Duet Night Abyss is a fantasy adventure RPG with a high degree of freedom developed by Hero Games' Pan Studio. The game features "multiple weapon loadouts & 3D combat" at its core, and tells the story of "Demons" from dual perspectives.

name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Flip or Flop
description: Help SpongeBob cook Krabby Patties for his customers all throughout shifts. Watch out for special orders and Patrick, for he is hungry.

name: Don Quixote: A Dream in Seven Crystals
description:
Don Quixote wakes from a nightmare about the destruction of the kingdom of Trapobana. Deciding to pursue the dream, he leaves to rescue the Princess Dulcinea and return the seven crystal balls that govern the kindgom.

This RPG is a first-person dungeon crawler with exploration and combat in the traditional Wizardry style. It makes extensive use of the LaserActive's hardware, with all conversations and even in-battle combat animations using laserdisc FMV with traditional animation.

name: Ominous
description: Ominous is a thriller/horror game for up to 4 players. In this game, you must collaborate with your teammates to face a creature within an indoor setting. What sets Ominous apart is its unique approach to multiplayer, offering a distinct experience compared to many other horror games available.

name: RTE Worlds
description: Dive into a thrilling multiplayer survival adventure in RTE Worlds. With a dynamically generated world, random dungeons, and limitless replayability. Explore by land, sea, and air, and immerse yourself in a captivating story brimming with quests and unforgettable NPCs. Your epic journey begins here!

name: Total Apocalypse
description: Duke has to kill the Cycloid Emperor, and he go out from Los Angeles, now destroyed and occupied by the aliens. His only intention is to inform the situation to the OTAN and EDF Central Command, and he has leave the heavy guns. He only carries the small pistol. But the situation is seemingly impossible, and he will trip through a dangerous way that he did can't wait, and now is too late! A lot of environments he will see now, and the situations will change through the battle. He has dream that the Total Apocalypse prophecy comes true...

name: Alien Invasion
description: Alien Invasion is a total conversion for Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition. It was created by Fred Hero and released on June 16th, 1999. It contains new levels, new graphics (including graphics from Wolfenstein 3D, Doom, Doom II, Shadow Warrior, Blood, and Rise of the Triad: Dark War) new voice-overs (including voice-overs from Shadow Warrior), and new music (including music from Doom, Shadow Warrior, Blood, and Rise of the Triad: Dark War).

name: American Assault
description: Following the events of "The Birth," aliens come to screw up Duke Nukem's vacation. Now it's up to Duke to travel across the United States of America and stop the alien invasion.

name: 25th Century Duke
description: 25th Century Duke is an add-on episode set in the 25th Century, a time where the global population is exceeding the 300 billion mark. The environment has been depleted so much so that the creation of oxygen now rests in the hands of big industries. The cities of the world reach higher and higher for the clouds. Scenarios not dis-similar to those found in the cult movies BladeRunner and The Fifth Element.

name: Aqua 1
description: Find the Mini Aqua sub and get your ass out of there as soon as possible.

name: Aqua 2
description: You have arrived in the stolen mini-sub and now you must fight your way to gain entrance to the experimental battle sub which will take you to the Island Prison in Aqua3.map

name: Aqua 3
description: Fight your way out of the battle sub and then prepare to take on the Aqua prison which has been overrun by escaped alien maggots. Blow them away and get you butt to the prison shuttle to Io...

name: Bad Weekend
description: A 7 level episode with two secret levels (nine levels total)

name: Battlefield 3
description: One very large map with over 2000 enemies.

name: Burnt
description: Very action packed with a lot of monsters in each of the maps.

name: Leaving L.A.
description: Duke is sitting in a Motel room watching TV. After he defeated the alien invasion, he has been bored for some time. Suddenly someone knocks on the door

name: Holiday Holocaust
description: Duke is up against something far greater and more powerful than your standard army of bloodthirsty aliens. This time, Mother Earth is out to get him !

name: Research Station
description: The EDF had been receiving some radio transmissions from a weather research station at the north pole. The scientists that worked there had been reporting to EDF about strange sounds at night and that some of their sled-dogs had been killed. EDF decided to send in Duke to investigate a few days after the transmissions had stopped.

name: Hasit
description: 'hasit' is Czech for extinguish and in not breaking with tradition accurately describes the theme of the level. You start out in a burning apartment from which you'd do well to escape, which of course requires running through flames in an attempt to sound a fire alarm, which results in a fire truck crashing through a wall. Escape? Not quite - you've now got a half dozen pig cops to contend with.

name: Palace Charitas
description: Palace Charitas is a reasonably small, intermittently detailed gentleman's club of sorts.

name: Command and Conquer Map Pack
description: What was once destined to be a Total Conversion for Duke fell miserably short and is probably now best classed as an episode, albeit with only four single player levels (and the subsequent inclusion of 3 finished DM maps, 1 unfinished DM and 1 unfinished SP)

name: BJ Shrine
description: This is the first Community Build Project. Instead of creating each section anew, mappers have taken the best bits of their previous levels and joined them together.

name: Community Build Project 2
description: The idea of a CBP is to put some parts from different mappers all together in a single map. In this one, each mapper made a new contribution, a room which was built specially for it.

name: Community Build Project 3
description: A map built by 10 different builders. So 10 different styles everything is SP. Basically same idea as CBP2.

name: Community Build Project 4
description: The fourth CBP is all that you'd expect, although it's focused more on blowing things up than using your head.

name: Community Build Project 5
description: Community build project with a dark, scary, snowy city map

name: Community Build Project 6
description: The aliens have taken over an island base and it's up to Duke to kick their asses out of paradise.

name: Community Build Project 7
description: The seventh CBP was initiated by Supertanker back in January 2006. We decided to work under the old limits and focus on one theme - hitech (the level turned out to be very consistent with its theme)

name: Community Build Project 8: Metropolitan Starlight
description: Duke comes out of the rest room to find his beloved domed city in orbit around the Earth has been overrun by aliens. You must explore the city and find a way to unlock the central spire which contains a nuke button that causes the city to self-destruct, as it's the only way to guarantee wiping out all the alien scum before they make it to Earth.

name: Complex
description: Another alien attack on Earth... this time the aliens took over a small moon base and are sending troops via teleporters to Los Angeles. The teleporters are being run from a U.S. military establishment on a small, rocky island in the Pacific. Duke is sent there alone (his preference), to find the teleporters and get to the moon base. The trouble is, the moon base is probably locked up. The commander of the base has the only key card - he was murdered in his Embassy Suites hotel room in L.A.. Duke will probably have to retrieve it. If and when he reaches the self destruct center at the base, he will have only a few moments to escape. There is an escape route already defined (leading to the docking bay). It will be opened after the base's self destruct mode has been initiated. Good luck...

name: Countdown to Christmas
description: Episode contains 3 independent levels (Snow Battle, Christmas Tree, Christmas Carol), united by small intros. Have new textures, sounds and effects.

name: Crucial Conflict 1: Suspicious Storage
description: During the neverending fight against the alien domination, mankind has seen many strange and shocking things. Women being kidnapped and held in cocoons, average day streetlife being brutally disturbed by the unknown power from outer space... With huge efforts, the Earth Defence Forces (EDF) have been able to stabilize the situation. Now it is time to fight back and stop the invasion.

name: Crucial Conflict 2: Waterworld
description: After a routine flight above Western Europe, Duke Nukem, EDF's best agent, crashed on the roof of a storage facility near Rotterdam mainport, in The Netherlands. Completely dazed he tried to find some help or at least contact the outside world, but none of that worked out. He encountered aliens instead and not one humanbeing seemed to be alive. Only some notes and logs where left.

name: Crucial Conflict 3: Acupa Dylana
description: Duke pursues the aliens, but is too late. Rotterdam has fallen a prey to the alien cruelty. With a totally massacred population, the city looks strangely deserted.

name: Death Drive
description:
Death Drive is a 5-level action packed episode taking a lot of inspiration from classic L.A. Meltdown levels and a more recent release Metropolitan Mayhem yet with a twist of my own style and challenging fights of my own map "Slaughterfest".
Basically it's a huge battle from the very beginning till the very end if played on the intended difficulty setting. What makes it a bit different from the rest is the fact that every single map of this episode was made less then in 20 hours each.

name: DN64 Revisited
description: 3 Duke Nukem 64 Exclusive DM maps morphed into a SP Episode Experience

name: Duke Nukem Is 007
description: While intended to become a James Bond TC, this project was never finished. However, 6 really nice maps remained. You will visit interesting locations like a flying plane, an underwater base or a Russian missile silo.

name: Duke is Ten
description: A group of premier mappers from the community had just three days to create a set of maps centered on the theme "ten" to celebrate DukeNukem3D's 10 year release anniversary.

name: Duke in Los Angeles
description: Duke travels to L.A to clear out remaining aliens, 11 levels, new textures and weapons and many new sounds.

name: Dukeland
description: The aliens stole Disneyland and brought it into space! Duke has to bring it back to Earth in this short (1h) fun ride through 2 detailed levels. Sightseeing and action merge!

name: Escape From San Angelos 2
description: This level takes place in a couple of cityblocks partially destroyed and with heavy earthquake activity.

name: Escape From San Angelos 3
description: Just like map number 2 this level takes place in a couple of cityblocks and rooftops. Even though the level 2 is more navigation friendly than this one.

name: Escape From San Angelos 4
description: Unknown to most, the aliens have a secondary reason for being here; our transporter technology. Our system is closing the gap with their system and they don't like it.

name: Escape From San Angelos 5
description: Having successfully escaped san-angelos, found the transporter to the alien home world ( levels one thru three ), and liberated the clandestine transporter research facility ( level four ), the time has come to deal with the real evil.... the alien sympathizers.

name: Eye of Cul
description: 17 maps for atomic edition with urban setting and some levels inspired by Blood

name: FbSp001
description: Military installation with snowy scenery, similar in style to maps of the BobSP Series.

name: FbSp002
description: Remake of XXX-Stacy from Duke3D ep.4.

name: FbSp003: City Under Siege
description: FbSp003: City Under Siege is pretty much exactly that, a city in the process of becoming another alien stronghold. As usual it's your job to do the down and dirty, getting in there and clearing out the invaders

name: Hydrostation
description: Duke Nukem, who is a veteran agent of EDF, had a very hard work the last 6 years. And now it was time for vacation :) Duke was on the coast of California for 3 months enjoying that he finally got some free time, and then, he returned to the EDF Headquarters to bring his help again.

name: God of War
description: 7 SP + 5 DM + 5 Arena maps. You have to travel to Mars to battle a new kind of alien queen who is spawning red troopers.

name: Incubation: Alien Apocalypse
description: After the killing of the alien queen in "The Birth" Duke rents an apartment in LA so that he can get some rest before he falls apart. However he didn't kill all the aliens in the first campaign and now those remaining have started to regroup. Find the remaining stronghold of the aliens and kick their asses off the planet; for good.

name: Industrial Complex
description: Episode with 6 levels (1 briefing w/o monsters, 1 secret) featuring new textures, sounds and a new shotgun.

name: JJ Duke Nukem 3D
description: Duke crashes down in a stolen alien cruiser but this time he is a little closer to home. Look for the new features. There's a special powerup called the SuperDukePak and a new actors amongst other things.

name: Jungle Tour
description: Duke is sent into a jungle to find a research center overrun by those alien scumbags

name: Jungle Tour 2
description: A canyon styled map with tropical scenery.

name: Jungle Tour 3: Ice Age
description: The sequel to Jungle Tour 2, this level follows very much the same 'fight for survival' pattern as its predecessor. There's no puzzles, just a huge, icy landscape with plateaus, rocky outcroppings and caves.

name: KaiseR Land 01
description: A level which explores the under-exploited aquatic base theme

name: KaiseR Land 02
description: The map begins exactly where its predecessor left and infiltrates even deeper into the deep sea. However, everything gets spicier when you get out of the base and confront a peculiar world of uncertainty.

name: KaiseR Land 03
description: The highly-anticipated sequel to KaiseR Land 02 takes place (unlike its predecessors) in an medieval environment, a theme which has not been stumbled upon too many times, surrounded by lovely decorations and the typical alien vermin afoot.

name: Skola
description: A recreation of what can only be described as a school of sorts

name: Sicilie
description: Short trip to a jailhouse, fire station and adult bookstore.

name: Banka
description: Duke visits a bank to withdraw his funds there

name: Doly
description: Explore an abandoned mine shaft and enter a submarine later to escape

name: Boyard
description: Very puzzle-oriented. Collect six letters for the exit password while opening doors in a fort.

name: Risk
description: An exceedingly short level, Risk takes place around a television recording studio which may or may not be based on a real life location

name: Vlak
description: Put your doctor on danger money, Vlak is set aboard an alien infested train with no consideration at all for your health or general well-being.

name: Aliens
description: Waking up from deep sleep on a space station, you find the place overrun by aliens; your only option is to destroy the reactor and get the hell out of there in an escape pod.

name: Letiste
description: Fight through an airport and a parked airplane.

name: XXX
description: A visit to a brothel with "recreational" areas

name: Petrin
description: Inspired by the Petřín hill in Prague, you enter a viewing tower full of alien scum.

name: Reichskanzlei
description: You have to visit the Nazi city hall in Berlin, and wipe out the Nazis of the aliens

name: Lost Highway
description: 7 levels (1 secret) with well-designed highway passages, vast canyons, a huge dam and even a cable car (if you find the secret exit).

name: Math-Pak
description: 5 levels (1 secret, 1 for credits without any action)You start in a common city area before entering a desolated factory. The last regular level is set in war-torn Bosnia with great ambient sounds, some traps and destroyed buildings.

name: Mic
description: 3 levels, increasing in difficulty and complexity. First, you go through a prison complex before entering an "Anti-Duke" training center where the aliens learn how to fight against Duke. In the finale, you have to find the power plant to shut down the whole installation.

name: MSSP
description: Features a grandiose storyline with new enemies, music, sounds, textures and sports 8 levels. Defeat the new emperor and stop the alien engineered plague...

name: Nuclear Pack
description: 9 SP (1 secret) + 12 DM maps. Only first episode ("Nuclear Neurosis") is for SP.

name: Operation Blitzkrieg
description: 5 levels in an urban setting with rather small-sized maps that won't take you longer than 10-15min to finish each.

name: Mp Power
description: A map with an airfield and a power plant facility.

name: Mp Weapon
description: A map with lava

name: The Flaming Shipwreck
description: Aliens have decided to grab a beer at a modernised British pub in Lynnchester called The Flaming Shipwreck, slaughtering the local folk and causing all sorts of trouble. Being too much for the local police force, Duke has been assigned to remove their presense from the area.

name: Dead Meat
description: Duke burger setting

name: Dark Side: Moonbase Mayhem
description: Reimagination of space map E2L8 "Dark Side"

name: X3 Studios
description: Reimagination of E4L7 "XXX-Stacey", but a lot bigger than the original

name: Bank Roll 2000
description: Reimagination of E3L2 "Bank Roll"

name: Duke Royale Remake
description: Replica of E4L4 for the PSX-exclusive episode "Plug 'n' Pray

name: Shark's Cove
description: Two Caribbean-style maps which were supposed to be the beginning of a full episode that never got finished.

name: Steve Long Episodes
description: This 32 level-pack shows the evolution of the author's mapping skills. Therefore, the first few maps are very basic.

name: Wet Dream
description: 2-level mini episode, consisting of HighWire's "Wet Dream" and "Tropical Alien Massacre". Great design with Caribbean setting, featuring fitting custom art and challenging gameplay.

name: Tam Duke
description: 9 maps (+1 secret) which rely solely on stock Duke3D assets in the making for 10 years. A special feature of this addon are its high-detailed sector-based cars and the fact that the levels are based on real locations (in Tampere, a city in southwest Finland)

name: DukeVR
description: DukeVR's idea is simple: Three episodes, eighteen levels, three colors (blue, green and red) and lots of nasty puzzles. Levels are short - shortest (simplest) levels take about twenty seconds while bigger & more complex ones take more than a minute.

name: The Army of Death
description: Castle Camelot has been taken over by a bunch of skeletons and your mission is to bone 'em to death.

name: The Final Confrontation
description: One of the first episodes (7 SP levels, 1 DM) for Duke3D. Especially famous for its train map "Moving Death".

name: The Gate
description: Duke has defeated the alien invasion force! What Duke doesn't know is that the force he defeated was the first wave and that the real armada is forming around the alien home world at this very moment! Providing 4 episodes with 24 levels, it is named by many as THE classic total conversion for Duke3D

name: Duke Lost Episodes
description: Contains 40 new levels, The 4 Lost Episodes of Duke Nukem, way back when he was still working for the CIA (see Duke Nukem I). Apparently, before the fight with Dr. Proton, he had fought off an alien invasion of Earth (though more in secrecy), the selfsame ones that tried again later during Duke Nukem 3D.

name: Time
description: 3 objective-based levels (a fourth is unfinished and without any action). What makes "Time" special is its emphasis on objective-based missions. If you fail to complete an objective before finishing the level, you are sent back in time so you can try again. In general, it is more about evading traps and blowing things up than pure action

name: The Prequel To Time
description: 4 maps which are more focused on design and combat. Like in its predecessor "Time", you still have certain things to do, but it's much less like a real mission.

name: Vacation Cove
description: 8 new Caribbean levels (1 secret)! Powered by an awesome soundtrack contributing a lot to the "vacation feeling", you will pay a visit to lagoons, a Mayan temple, a fun park and many more places where shotguns are needed instead of sunglasses! Even features a mini hub to which you return to for about 50% of the episode.

name: Wolf Pack
description: 6 SP (1 secret) and 2 Dukematch levels. Features a new weapon (Assault Rifle replacing chaingun) and edited CON code to alter enemy strengths, ammo amount and weapon power. The levels end up leading you from an EDF facility to a secret installation and a prison until you reach a starport. From there you enter a spaceship where the showdown with an Overlord takes place. In the secret level, you travel to an arctic region via submarine.

name: Outpost X
description: A two map mini episode: Duke is dropped off on a planet to investigate reports of an alien takeover.

name: MP Research Facility
description: A research facility has found an alien base on another planet. They aliens however fought back. They shot Duke out of they air in combat. Now he's really pissed off!

name: MP Orbit
description: A medium singleplayer level in space

name: Operation Kolpowitz
description: Infiltrate a nuclear arms facility set in the mountains, make a lot of aliens dead, launch a nuclear warhead and be home in time for Emmerdale Farm.

name: Hazardous Chemicals
description: A dark, dank but thoroughly interesting level set in a chemical facility

name: The Railway Station
description: The Railway Station is a short to medium sized level centered around none other than a railway station - and of course it's populated by alien scum

name: Total Infiltration
description: Total Infiltration is a six-level episode which takes exciting gameplay and alienesque design to a whole new level

name: Hijack
description: Duke hitched a ride on an alien shuttle and will try to borrow an alien transport pod so he can infiltrate the alien base.(ie.. the next level)

name: Escape
description: The second in the series (Hijack being the first), 'Escape' takes place in a supposed alien space station, which just happens to have a terran space vehicle parked out back.

name: Suburbia
description: It's urban/heavy industrial themed, which contradicts the name of the map, with multi-leveled train track.

name: Doom City
description: A large city block

name: Hell Station
description: A truly magnificent space station map

name: Mothership
description: A space map

name: EDF Overtaken
description: A remake of a bobsp inspired map

name: Q-Red
description: A remake of Red1 (from the Red series)

name: Repulse
description: A very difficult yet addictive Vectrex game. Maneuver your ship and destroy the mother fortress, while sentry ships attack you. Avoid crashing into the fortress. Take too long and the mother ship will attack at full force!

name: Birds of Prey
description: An excellent vertical shooter in this Vectrex compilation. Birds of Prey has 4 levels of shooting action against a fleet of alien space birds who´s sole goal is your annihilation! A 5th level puts you up against the final fleet and the mothership

name: The System: Opposing Facility
description:
A small island with a base has been overtaken by the aliens,
same old story and it's up to Duke to fix the problem. However what is there reason to take over an abandoned area anyway?

name: Simple Minded
description: A challenging maze-like city by which takes the form of the name from our beloved hero

name: Enlighten The Darkness: Again
description: A top-notch romp through a medieval-ish fantasy realm, where dragons be and yon dungeons lie.

name: ARSP1
description: A smallish city map with a few of your basic urban ammenities; movie theatre (entrance, at least), strip club, etcetera.

name: The Spiegul Contest
description: 3 city maps from a contest with the goal to use a small street area with mirroring windows and continue building a map based on that area. Only three entries made it into the final poll, with MRCK's and Taivo's maps both winning and Devastator's one getting the second place.

name: The Starlite Project
description: Starlite takes you to a top secret research facility which is surprisingly devoid of anything to stop you from simply walking in

name: Ruin
description: Ruin takes place in a ravaged city guarded by a whole lot of sentry drones

name: Daemonus
description: A large medieval-ish castle set in the middle of the sea

name: Agony
description: A DM map with SP added retroactively

name: Powerstation 64
description: A moonbase map that was originally only for DM but has SP added retroactively.

name: Babes
description: This is a modified version of babes map which was released a long time ago

name: The Chronic
description: A 5 level episode made by Sanek with help of Zykov Eddy in the first map.

name: Quest for 2Moo
description: The newly-christened Vriskye arrives in a forest.

name: Occult Case Files: Case One
description: Occult Case Files is an homage to the point n' clicks on the NES like Uninvited, Shadowgate and Deja-Vu. This demo was made over the course of 2 months and if reception is well we'll go full steam ahead and make it into a fully fledged game (After The Third Shift of course)

name: TV Kamishibai Vol. 1
description: TV Kamishibai Vol.1 is a collection of 3 different classic fairy tales that are narrate in Japanese voice.

name: Palm Town
description: A PS1 game, developed and published by Mycom, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: The Cradle of Thorns: My Brother Belongs to Me
description: The Cradle of Thorns was a Japanese free-to-play BL visual novel developed by Koyonplete. It was released on May 7th, 2014 for Android and iOS and was available in Japanese and English.

name: SQP Run
description:
Take control of one of 8 unique characters and embark on a frantic race where speed and reflexes are king!

Your goal: cover as many meters as possible by skilfully avoiding obstacles in your way with the help of jumps and slides. As your score increases, the speed of the game accelerates, making each new challenge more intense.

If you're feeling cornered, quickly grab an energy drink for a life-saving burst of speed. But be careful, one wrong move and you're done!

Prove you're the fastest by checking the global leaderboard or challenging your friends directly. Who will be able to run farther than the others?

It's up to you to play the virtuosos of speed! A frenzied Runner where the pace is king and each new game is even more addictive. Ready to challenge your limits
A celebration map for 3000 youtube videos. This was a speedmap and filmed progress.

name: Stronghold
description: More compact than my other maps, both in size and monster count, focusing on making an interconnected layout and more difficult encounters.

name: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering
description: 200 Line Massacre: The Slaughtering is a megawad (full 32 maps + 4 bonus) by @Arsinikk and @NinjaDelphox with the goal of making Vanilla slaughter-like maps under 200 lines. It is the sequel to 100 Line Massacre and also features additional mapping by @scwiba and @finnks13.

name: Night on Doom Mountain
description: A lengthy and difficult single level for Boom Compatible ports with a slightly otherworldly and halloween-esque theme.

name: Snowlord
description: In this minesweeper-like game made for Ludum dare 54, player must dig snow to build castles while avoiding getting caught.

name: Pony Arcadia
description:
Several pony kingdoms compete for territory, but never battle each other - they live in peace after all.

However, each player also controls an evil villain that will happily cause trouble...

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1
description: The Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 1 expands the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Players fight through the burning streets of Berlin in “Nightfire” and take up battle positions in fortified Japanese bunkers in "Knee Deep." “Station” offers a bombed out underground train station, and the Nazi Zombies return in “Verrückt” (Zombie Asylum) featuring more weapons, new Perks-a-Cola machines and electroshock defenses.

name: Sea of Thieves: Season 10
description: Team up with Guilds of up to 24 pirates, compete with other crews on your server for the Skull of the Siren Song, or take it easy on the Safer Seas,.

name: Godless Night
description: Godless Night is a GZDoom episode with the Supercharge gameplay mod built in. It features very light hub elements, loads of (mostly subtle) Castlevania inspiration, and plenty of secrets to find - especially for challenge-enthusiasts.

name: The Bugs Manor
description: The Bugs Manor is a free 2D pixel art horror game. Explore a cursed mansion, hide from scary monsters, and solve puzzles with an inventory-free gameplay, focused on direct interactions with the environment. Can you survive your first night in this haunted house and uncover its mysteries?

name: Shift 2
description:
Get your Shift fix with the next action packed flipping frenzy that is the world of shift.
This time not even gravity is what it seems!

name: Clown Meat
description: Clown Meat is a Precision Platformer with an emphasis on speedrunning and replayability. Tumble through a butchered world where humanity is barely a memory on your naïve journey to cheer up the monolithic clown that came from the Depths of Jupiter.

name: Prajator: Image Ranger
description: Sin descripción

name: Omega Chase Deluxe
description: Omega Chase (non-deluxe version) is the predecessor to Omega Chase Deluxe and was a download only version of the game. While there are a number of differences between Omega Chase and Omega Chase Deluxe, Omega Chase is included on Omega Chase Deluxe along with the game Zap. The main difference between the two versions of the game is that with Omega Chase, the enemies travel in only one direction around the center of the track, but in Omega Chase Deluxe, the enemies travel from both sides simultaneously. Creator Christopher Tumber felt there was no need to release the original file on cartridge as it was included on the compilation of the game.

name: Becky's Message
description: Becky's Message is a clone of the first screen of Donkey Kong only.

name: Vec Sports Boxing
description:
Vec Sports Boxing has both a one player mode and a two player mode.

In one player mode, the player controls a boxer who is training to become the top fighter. The player's coach will call out commands and the player will have to mimic those commands. Accuracy is important and if the player make a wrong move then he will have to start the training session over again.

In two player mode, the players control boxers who are sparring. Each player is trying to wear the other's stamina down and knock them out first. The first to win two rounds wins the match.

name: War of the Robots
description: The player controls a gun turret on a watchtower in the Robot Drop Zone. Robots circle the tower and shoot seekers at the player in an attempt to deplete their damage gauge. Both the robots and the seekers must be destroyed, but ammo is not infinite and must be used with care. When the player's ammo is completely spent, it's only a matter of time before game over. In a phase where a certain number of robots must be destroyed, the player is just a sitting duck; however, in a survival phase, it is possible to advance to the next stage if the player has enough health, then they can can wait out the time limit.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 is a promotional browser game by McDonald's in collaboration with Sega and Paramount based around the movie of the same name.

name: The Book of the Dead
description: This is a story where you are a Grim Reaper. On the night of the 31st of October (Halloween) every year, Grim Reaper gets a chance to save only one person. Get to know all of the characters by hearing their stories and make your choice.

name: Shifted
description:
Shifted's gameplay is based on Pesky Marbles, a Java game developed by Martijn Wenting under the Karma Studios label in 2003 for cellular phones. In Shifted, the task is to combine three or more marbles of a specific colour next to each other to make them explode.

Shifted is an improved version of Pesky Marbles with enhanced gameplay in challenge mode and adapted for the Vectrex.

name: Toytopia
description: Explore the abandon ruins of Toytopia experience the wonders that were once seen at this once amusing attraction. Always check behind your back because something is always lurking near you, meet the varying cast members of Toytopia and try your best to survive.

name: Dungeon Hunter 6
description:
Thrilling Gameloft ARPG Sequel!
Unite, fearless Bounty Hunters, and embrace Dungeon Hunter VI - a unique and enthralling hack-and-slash odyssey that continues the cherished saga. Enter uncharted territories, reunite with iconic characters, and experience a new level of excitement in this extraordinary installment!

Return to the Valenthia 200 years after the brave sacrifice of the Bounty Hunter and experience brand new thrilling adventures, in a scale never seen before in a Dungeon Hunter Game.

name: Hypercube: Source
description:
Hypercube: Source is a HL2 deathmatch mod. It takes place inside of the same cube that was seen in the moive "Cube 2: Hyperucbe". It has traps from all three cube movies, and has been designed to simulate infinite cubes in a finite number of rooms. The object of the game is to simply, get out of the cube alive.

There are three exits in this cube, and to make it more difficult only one exit is activated at one time. Its not easy to get out don't give up.

name: CliffDivers
description: Sin descripción

name: Iglacia
description: In this drawing-based roguelite, play as a penguin with a stash of powerful crystals to fight off hordes of enemies by drawing and shooting your way to victory!

name: Building & Fighter
description: A reality-based action RPG where you can experience thrilling action unfolding against actual buildings in Korea.

name: 3D PrintMaster Simulator
description: The ultimate 3D printing simulation and management game! Dive into the world of 3D printing technology, where you'll build, customise, and manage your very own 3D printing workshop!

name: Re:D Cherish!
description:
In 206X, the resort island "Eleutheria" floats on the Adrishina Sea. The protagonist, Kusaka Yukimitsu, comes to an earthly paradise that advocates "freedom for all". Deprived of his work, his hometown, his beliefs, everything he once had up to that point...
There, Yukimitsu meets a gray-haired girl, Unica. She lost her father, and her cherished place of memories--the diner restaurant is in the hands of others and everything is taken away. Unica had a dream "I want to revive the diner".
Yukimitsu reaches out to her. I'll help you. So give me a dream.
This is Eleutheria. The city of freedom that has gone too far, the city of dreams where anything goes.
The preparation of the dishes is perfect, the kitchen is flawless. Spare magazines are enough, safety device is released.
"Everyone, are you all ready? Daft Dream Diner is now open...!"
--Eat and drink for those who are lost, may it be the food for tomorrow--

name: Aquarium Land: Complete Edition
description: Dive into an aquatic world where amazing animals await you!

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Young Gun Grave
description: Sin descripción

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Time Limited
description: Sin descripción

name: Urban Flow: Diamond Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: War Zone Soldier: Battle Royale Shooter
description: Welcome to the action-packed battle royale shooter! Grab your weapons and try to be the last one standing, shooter!

name: Wargroove + Wargroove 2 Bundle
description:
Take to the battlefield with Wargroove, a strategy game for up to 4 players! Choose your Commander and battle warring factions. Design and share maps, cut-scenes and campaigns with editors and customization tools.

Embark on an all-new adventure in Wargroove 2, filled with unlikely friendships, unknown adversaries, and ugly revenge plots. Wage war against your foes with a cast of new Commanders and utilise their new tiered ‘groove’ ability system to sway the fight in your favour.

name: Mystical Mixing: Wand and Frog Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixel Paint 2: Ocean
description: Sin descripción

name: Prison Break: Jail Escape Simulator
description: Addictive jailbreak puzzle game! Plan your escape route, sneak around in stealth mode and bypass all cameras and alarms!

name: Spin Rhythm XD: Supporter Pack DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Games: Galaxy Attack
description: A great galactic threat is looming, and only you can save humanity!

name: Street Basketball Club: Sport Throw Simulator
description: The basketball simulator will train your accuracy, because the realistic ball physics is the most difficult opponent!

name: The Trotties Adventure
description: Discover the new magical Trotties adventures with their amazing videogame, perfect for your little ones!

name: The Kitty in the Trapping Garden
description: On my way to a temple, I found a garden. What's wrong with this place……！？

name: Hentai World: Director's Cut
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Golf: Hole in Two
description:
In Golf: Hole in Two you can play a round of golf anytime with no worries; just sit back, play, and relax!

Your goal is to find the perfect angle and power for every stroke, to be able to get a hole in two strokes on every course.

name: For a Vast Future: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Foot Clinic: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Fashion Princess: Super Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Easy Learning: Classical Music
description:
Classical Masterpiece songs that everyone has heard…
But do you actually know the title?

name: Dyschronia: Chronos Alternate - Definitive Edition
description: As the Clocktower bell tolls, your fate hangs in the balance. Experience an epic story in this cinematic investigation action adventure for the Nintendo Switch.

name: Car for Sale Simulator 2023: Car Mechanic, Wash, Car Flipper
description: Step into the fast-paced world of automotive entrepreneurship with Car for Sale!

name: Castaway of Steel
description: The player wakes up on an enigmatic island, where he finds a coliseum and people fighting. Nothing is what it seems, can you survive this adventure full of mysteries?

name: Cats Bundle
description: A bundle of six cat themed games on Nintendo Switch.

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Character Pass
description: Sin descripción

name: Cooking Arena: 8 in 1 Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Gungrave G.O.R.E: Ultimate Enhanced Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Draw and Color: Kawaii - Ultra Deluxe
description: Sin descripción

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing: Rally Edition
description: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Edition is the ultimate kart racing experience for DreamWorks Animation fans young and young at heart by bundling the full game together with the DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Pack's exclusive characters and content in one action-packed offering.

name: DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing: Rally Pack
description: The DreamWorks All-Star Kart Racing Rally Pack exclusively includes Kung Fu Panda's Master Oogway and Puss in Boots: The Last Wish's Wolf as playable characters, unique karts inspired by the characters plus spoilers, wheels, engines and different chassis designs to completely customize their karts.

name: Awarded Platformer Bundle
description: Get the award-winning platformer games "In Between" and "Toby: The Secret Mine" in this awesome bundle!

name: Ultimate Games Bundle
description:
Ultimate Games is proud to present an extraordinary gaming bundle for Xbox enthusiasts, featuring a collection of their titles. This bundle offers a diverse range of gaming experiences that will keep you entertained for hours on end. Here's a glimpse into the world of Ultimate Games:
- Aery - Heaven & Hell
- Animal Shelter Simulator
- Anthology of Fear
- Aquarist
- Bad Dream: Coma
- Bouncy Bob 2
- Bug Academy
- Car Demolition Clicker
- Car Detailing Simulator
- Car Mechanic Simulator Classic
- Castle Renovator
- Commander ’85
- Deadliest Catch: The Game
- Demolish & Build
- Demolish & Build Classic
- Drill Deal - Oil Tycoon

name: WWE 2K23: Bad Bunny Edition
description: Step back in the ring with international icon Bad Bunny with the WWE 2K23 Bad Bunny Edition*. Featuring a new Bad Bunny playable character based on his Backlash ‘23 appearance in Puerto Rico and more, plus all of the bonus content from the WWE 2K23 Icon Edition!

name: Anno 1800: Gold Edition
description: The path you choose will define your fate! Dive deeper into empire-building with the Anno 1800 Gold Edition.

name: Cooking Trip: Collector's Edition
description: Cooking Trip - walk the path to perfection. Fulfill your dream and become a great chef!

name: Crown of the Empire: Collector's Edition
description: Crown of the Empire: fun adventures await! The queen needs your help!

name: Lost Inca Prophecy 2: The Hollow Island
description: Join Seraphine in this amazing adventure to save the world from its doom in Lost Inca Prophecy 2: The Hollow Island!

name: Early-blooming Black Lily: Itsuki-chan no Obentou
description: Sin descripción

name: Gesshoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Shanshui Haven
description: Explore, Build, Prosper — Embark on a tranquil and strategically rich journey of city-building in ancient China.

name: WWE 2K23: Bad Bunny Edition - Bonus Pack
description: The WWE 2K23: Bad Bunny Edition - Bonus Pack features the Bad Bunny Backlash '23 playable character, Evo MyFaction card, 15K VC Pack, and more. The Bad Bunny Edition Bonus Pack is also included as part of the WWE 2K23 Bad Bunny Edition. Base game required.

name: Warpath
description: "Warpath" is a topdown shooter with diverse classes, customizable vehicles, and intense game modes. Command vehicles, dominate in team battles, and prove your skills. Join the fight now!

name: Culture Warz: Time's Up Karen! - Suburbs Map Pack
description: A peaceful neighborhood... but for how long?

name: Traveler: Set Sail
description: This is a semi-real-time tactical adventure RPG game. Adventure and battle in a high-freedom fantasy world! Meet different companions and embark on an adventure together. Different regions are inhabited by various types of creatures, awaiting your exploration.

name: Iruka ni Uroko ga Nai Wake
description: Specially to selfish Honey Mustard-chan who stays up until this hour, I think I should explain to her why dolphins don't have scales.

name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour South Korea
description: An inspiring journey to the land of "morning freshness"! Collect fascinating puzzles, marvel at the beauty of snow-white beaches on the shores of the Pacific Ocean, see unique temples of South Korea and get acquainted with the national Korean cuisine.

name: Alruna and the Necro-Industrialists
description: Alruna is a compact and high-density Metroidvania, with a focus on sequence-breaking and playing things out of order.

name: Astro Planes
description: Astro Planes is a sci- fi fantasy space shooter. Laser blast your way through space and use powerful missiles to neutralize the enemy with explosive chaos and use your dashing ability to evade enemy fire.

name: Australian Maze
description: Are you afraid of spiders?, then this game is not for you. You will feel like a resident of Australia. There are more spiders in this country than stars in the universe. The spiders here are huge and each of them wants to bite you in the ass.

name: Aztec Tiki Talisman
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure in Aztek Tiki Talisman! Explore 50 challenging levels in the mystical Aztec jungle, battle foes, solve puzzles, and confront epic bosses. Will you find the blue talisman and unlock the portal to the next level?

name: Back to Hearth
description: A cozy narrative-focused exploration game in which you repair the houses of an abandoned forest settlement to bring the former inhabitants back home after the Calamity has occurred.

name: Ball Hentai Puzzle
description: Ball Hentai Puzzle is a puzzle solving game with the objective of reaching the end with at least one life remaining. This game allows you to have calm and relaxing moments. Enjoy beautiful women while solving your puzzles.

name: Aversion
description: Experience the challenging events Iris faces through her journey.

name: Arsenal Online
description: High-octane 2D shooter. Put your shooting skills to the test with over 200 weapons and attachments. Play game modes solo or co-op online!

name: Baldr's Squid Isekai: A Parody
description: Baldr’s Squid Isekai is adult parody RPG with lots of cartoon violence and sex!

name: Agnostic Requiem
description: An AVG that records the struggles of girls in the melody of the times.

name: Aimcademy
description: Aimcademy is a science-based aim trainer. The combination of sport science and gaming leads to the most efficient way of training in gaming. Unleash your true potential!

name: Underground Waifus TCG
description: Underground Waifus it's a CCG, Deck Builder TCG with PVP Card Battler F2P Game.

name: Body Count
description: Embark upon a cop's gripping journey of vengeance through this bullet hell shooter.

name: Beneath & Beyond
description: First person co-op PVE fantasy RPG with semi-realistic graphics and procedurally generated level.

name: Beneath the Backrooms
description: Beneath the Backrooms is an horror and exploration game; Lost in the Backrooms, your character will have to fight his/her mental health problems and monstrous creatures. In the darkness.

name: Blood Orange: Definitive Edition
description: Underwater psychological horror with a shocking, character-driven narrative. Explore ruins beneath the amazon river basin, and converse with their dolphin inhabitants. Skillfully capture and develop photographs with your underwater camera.

name: Conquer-Strike 2
description: Conquer-Strike 2: Dive into the ultimate FPS experience! Navigate war-torn landscapes, strategize in dynamic multiplayer modes, and rise through the ranks. Where every shot shapes the future. Ready to conquer?

name: Cooking Simulator: Sushi
description: Start a new culinary challenge and run your own sushi bar in one of Japan's cozy street food districts.

name: Corgi in the Box
description: You are locked in an unfamiliar room with your beloved dog. Use the items in the room and cooperate with your dog to escape. There is a short story and three different endings. When you reach an ending, a hidden secret will be revealed.

name: Corked
description: A Ski and Snowboard game for skiers and snowboarders. Get Corked.

name: Chicken Done
description: The more stressful anti-stress game that eleven out of ten psychologists advice against. Dangerously addictive for neurodivergent people.

name: Cat Ball: Gravity Maze
description: Help our cat ball find the fish in a gravity controlled maze.

name: Casino Conqueror
description: Forge your ultimate card deck and unlock powerful upgrades as you confront formidable adversaries in high-stakes Poker and Blackjack showdowns. Do you possess the skills needed to carve a path to the heart of the casino and exact vengeance for your grandfather's death?

name: Build For Sale Simulator
description: Real estate simulation game. Buy, renovate and sell a house at affordable prices! Build your own real estate empire!

name: Bride into the Cave
description: Myth lingers in a tranquil and remote ancient town in China. In one telling, once a beautiful maiden is chosen by the cave deity, her soul disappears from the mortal realm. A minority girl called Miao Fei embarks on her journey to uncover the truth behind the legend, and rescue herself, perhap.

name: Carprogram
description: An application that lets you lay down roads, this is your future non-fictional story.

name: Brickhaven
description: Create your gang from nothing. Start off with just yourself and take it from a single member to a sprawling criminal empire. Extort businesses, deal drugs, sell guns, and much more. Customize your gang to partake in whatever crimes you want them to. What kind of boss will you be?

name: BrickBounce
description: Hit the right button corrrectly when the ball is upcoming to the brick , play the music with your keyboard.

name: White Wolf: Treasure Hunter 2
description: Free yourself from the Dark Magic of the Mystical Chest?!

name: Wild Seasons
description: Wild Seasons is a roguelike, card battler where deck-building meets base-building. Cultivate a garden that grows mystical cards, orchestrate unique decks as your plants go in and out of season, and coordinate strategic plays across multiple turns to unleash wildly powerful combos!

name: Zombie Rooms
description: The zombie apocalypse takes a hilarious dimension

name: Wound Man
description: Wound Man is your guide on a gruesome adventure through the ages. Piece his epic story together while literally piecing him together. Poke, prod, stab and slice away to reveal his secrets. It's a jigsaw adventure! - but not for the faint of heart.

name: Wonder Wonder Punch
description: A world where everyone holds a rank and every rank above you that dies moves you up the ladder. Fight, Upgrade and build your way to be the strongest person in the world. Weapons, items and abilities gathered in story mode can be used to hunt other players in PvP multiplayer modes.

name: Willy and Rosie: Bust Out of the Big House
description: A rage quit platformer set in a cartoony world. Meet weird and funny characters as you throw yourself upward on the long journey to give your Ball and Chain the honeymoon she deserves.

name: World of Blocks
description: World of Block is a sandbox game where the player has complete freedom to build their own world, using shapes, objects, and textures customized by the player.

name: Umbral
description: Umbral is a game focused on its own story and narrative, with a first-person view, elements of horror, exploration and puzzles. In Umbral, you take on the role of Mateus, a young adult frustrated with life who, after facing several personal problems, decides to commit suicide. However...

name: Uncover
description: Sin descripción

name: Welcome to Lightford
description: Dive into Welcome to Lightford, a captivating mystery detective sim set in 1998. Unravel the town's secrets with unique solutions for each challenge, pushing your wits beyond the ordinary. Can you crack the mysteries and navigate the small town of Lightford?

name: Warmongers
description: Choose one of the heroes with their unique armies and go to war against the rest! Make the most of limited resources, explore foreign lands and show your skills in turn-based battles.

name: WarDoom Wargame
description: 2D Hard core, Hex & Chit, Turn Based Wargame with A.I. or Hotseat. Move units or stacks around, attack using all the info from live database and unit breakdowns. set your battle objectives in the battle report. A detailed Editor effect live game systems

name: Vellum
description: Dive into magic tomes to discover pages of increasing power, sling ink-infused spells, and choose how your foes evolve - as a group or solo!

name: Urban Entrepreneur
description: Manage inventory, staff, prices and more while creating a monopoly!

name: Virtual Rides 3: Northstar
description: A new ride was spotted at the Virtual Rides 3 fairground. The new ride "Northstar" gives its visitors a wild and unique ride with high G-forces.

name: The Cerpan Project
description: Welcome to Project Cerpan! As a new test subject, you will have to go through countless puzzles and tests that will put your intelligence to the limit. Embark on this new Graphic Adventure with Red Salazar and discover what mysteries are happening in Calle Larga.

name: Stranded Engineers
description: Stranded Engineers is a city-building game in which your strategy and economy skills are required. Build large citys on several islands, take care of your resource buildings and make your citizens happy.

name: Super Retro Retry
description: 100 levels, some are easy, some not, sometimes flipped horizontally, sometimes flipped vertically, always randomized! And ONE SINGLE LIFE. Customize your experience. Are you ready for the ultimate Retro challenge? Are you ready for Retry?

name: Taken Soul
description: Taken Soul is a survival horror game developed by SOGA Studio. The protagonist play in third-person perspective, he must navigate through dangerous and tense situations, try to survive till the sun rises, and fight against dark forces to investigate the disappearance of his mother and sister.

name: Mutants Ate My Carrots
description: A fairytale forest in decay. A black rabbit ready to fight... and a king lion who only looks out for himself. Unlock new skills and discover who stole your carrots in a humorous adventure full of fun puzzles and mutated kickass moves.

name: Taz Cebula's Brides of Vampira: The Circle of Seven
description: On the moon world Mordain, a suffocating veil of Eternal Darkness emerges. In a cryptic vision, the formidable warrior, Leia Blackthorne, crosses paths with a mysterious being - 'The Watcher' - who impels her towards the town of Grimstead. A foreboding darkness awaits her, veiling untold secrets.

name: Terminal V
description: Terminal V is a game about speedsters with a unique control scheme that allows the player to move at insane speeds with full control. Dodge bullets, traverse obstacles, and mow down hordes of enemies with celerity and precision.

name: Sticky Situations
description: Join the world of Stickman Battles! Dive into exciting gang wars, enjoy easy-to-pick-up gameplay, and have a blast with fun-filled stickman fights. Ready for the showdown?

name: Song of Slavs
description: Song of Slavs is a 2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management hybrid with a minimalist feel wrapped in a beautiful, modern pixel art aesthetic.

name: Song Song
description: The story is about a detective This is a psychological puzzle game, The game belongs to the psychological horror genre.

name: Spartan's Spear
description: Spartan's Spear is a thinky adventure set in Ancient Greece. Battle creatures of all kind with your wit and the might of your spear! Maneuver in tight spaces, loot chests for helpful items.

name: Split Polarity: The Science Puzzle Arcade Game!
description: Get ready Scientists, things are about to get crazy! The atoms have become unstable, so it's your job to guide the highly volatile particles into the black holes. Play against friends in local multiplayer in Versus Mode, or attempt a high score in the Labyrinth.

name: Staff Runner
description: Unleash your inner musical maestro with Staff Runner, the captivating educational game that transforms sheet music learning into an exciting adventure. Say goodbye to dull lessons and hello to a fun, interactive way to read sheet music.

name: Sports Illustrated: Championship Football & Baseball
description: Sports Illustrated: Championship Football & Baseball is a multiplatform sports video game that is licensed by sports magazine Sports Illustrated which features both American football and baseball games

name: Uh Oh Calico!
description: Prepare yourself for a challenging, strategic, exciting and fur-strating puzzle game! Inspired by the popular Watermelon Game comes this 3D cat-tastic game of combining growing cats in a confined claw machine. Make combos and get the highest score without letting any cats fall out!

name: Tournament Tower
description: Tournament Tower is a deckbuilding roguelike game based on rock-paper-scissors. Face a colorful cast of enemies in exciting card battles and upgrade your deck of moves to climb your way through a wacky never-ending martial arts tournament inspired by shonen anime tropes.

name: The Most Beautiful Room in the World
description: Virtual world that reenacts through interactive animations the content painted by Andrea Mantegna in the Saint Giorgio Castle in Mantua, Italy. Virtual Reality interactive animated environment. For artists and scholars.

name: The King of Creation
description: This is a shooting game with exquisite game backgrounds and character images.

name: The Elision Effect
description: The Elision Effect is a short surreal puzzle game. The last person finds themselves in an empty office. Not knowing what made everyone abandon these liminal spaces, they look for an exit.

name: The Edibles
description: Play as a creature that woke up on an alien planet and destroy everything around you, picking up genetic information to evolve into the strongest creature you can find. Defeat the bosses hiding in the castle and get your hands on the magical orbs.

name: The Vorezkor Hack
description: Uncover an existential conspiracy, rescue your friend and save the world from mindless drudgery in this irreverent Sci-fi point and click adventure!

name: Roll the Ball
description: Balance, pace and win the race! Embark on a thrilling journey with Roll the Ball! Dive into vibrant visuals across three unique biomes as you race against the clock to reach the finish line. Choose from three engaging game modes, Time Rush, Challenge and Speed Run and try to reach the top!

name: Monochrome Boo & Baby Boo: Kururin Boo
description: Monochrome Boo & Baby Boo: Kururin Boo is a Puzzle game, developed by Success and published by Creative Core, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Infestation Sea
description: Infestation is a Survival Horror MMO that immerses players in a zombie-infested, post-apocalyptic world in which a viral outbreak has decimated the human population leaving in its wake, a nightmare of epic proportion.

name: Solar War
description: Solar War! A fast-paced, space-themed, shoot-em-up, bullet hell, arcade style game where players attempt to shoot and weave through a horde of enemy planets in a bid to survive just a little bit longer.

name: Some RPG Game
description: Welcome to the perilous world of Some RPG Game, a medieval fantasy that immerses you in a gritty and unforgiving realm teeming with danger and opportunity. Set in a time of swords and sorcery, struggling to survive amidst the harsh realities of this treacherous world.

name: Solitary Cat
description: The ultimate lightweight solitaire featuring simple yet robust rules for hours of dark-mode fun! Based on Klondike, 40 Thieves, and Bakers Game.

name: Solitris
description: Solitaire, Meet Tetris

name: Shadow of Fear
description: In 'Shadow of Fear', your only purpose is to solve puzzles and then escape; You can also continue to survive, whether you can survive until the end depends on yourself

name: Sign Craft: Simulator
description: Sign Craft: Simulator puts you in the steel-toe boots of a Sign Technician! It is a 3D first-person game that allows you to utilize power tools and equipment to construct signs!

name: Skibidi Backrooms
description: Skibidi Backrooms is a cooperative horror game for a group of 4 players. Solo mode is also available. You have to survive among the backrooms and find a way out before you are overtaken by the Skibidi toilet. Updates and various interesting things await you...

name: Shadow of the Depth
description: Shadow of the Depth is a top-down action Roguelite game. Delve into a dungeon world of light and shadow to eradicate the monsters that ravage your home. Be prepared to step into the abyss before you!

name: Sedap! A Culinary Adventure
description: Sedap! A Culinary Adventure is a co-op cooking-combat adventure that combines the chaos of a collaborative kitchen and the wonders of adventuring into an unexplored world. Embark on an exciting culinary journey, whip up delectable delicacies, and serve your way through a fantastical reimagination of Southeast Asia!

name: Robo Rush
description: Robo Rush is a fast-paced action platformer focused on finishing one level as fast as you can!

name: Santa World
description: Join the festive adventure and help Santa Claus in his quest to save Christmas in this captivating platformer game, Santa World!

name: Sate
description: Delve into a first-person, PSX-inspired horror. In 'SATE', darkness engulfs towns, and a haunting hunger for meat prevails. Can you navigate the shadows and uncover the mystery?

name: Scent of Greed
description: As a psychology student, you find yourself isolated for an entire summer break in a desolate village. While trying to survive you must manage limited resources, explore, scavenge and unravel a chilling horror story. Yet, in this eerie place, you're never truly alone.

name: OTurret
description: OTurret - is an action tower defense game with elements of engineering and survival where you play as a brave frog defending itself against giant insects. Build various defensive structures, from cannons to magnetic traps, to help the frog survive in a dangerous world.

name: One Week With The Mafia
description: After a misuse of your home address, and the general incompetence of an old friend, you find yourself stuck with the Italian mafia hunting you down. In this parody of Scott Cawthon's "Five Nights at Freddy's", it is up to you to stop the mafia from wasting you.

name: Psychofinger
description: Survive hordes of ghosts in this FPS-roguelite. Become an agent at the Department of Metaphysical Investigations and unveil the mystery of an old church. Choose Aberrant Items that will upgrade your character, fight bosses and unlock new hand gestures.

name: Poor Mouse
description: It's a fast paced action platformer with a cute mouse that has to explore dangerous and fantastical worlds.

name: Pizza Spy
description: The secret agent "Ace" represents the latest generation of spies: armed with improbable Pizza Gadgets, he will have to travel the world to thwart a global gastronomic threat. Test your skills in this action-comedy adventure game by the makers of “Detective Gallo”!

name: Pixel Kane
description: Immerse yourself in a unique adventure with Kane! Run, jump and solve situations taking into account the physical laws of the new world.

name: Pew Pew Squad
description: In Pew Pew Squad, battle zombies in a post-apocalyptic setting. Take out the undead, buy new weapons, and up your odds of survival. Fast-paced action and constant challenges await you in this thrilling game!

name: Pocket Race: Driver
description: Pocket Race: Manager is a miniature race driving game with simple controls, but demanding driving and some strategic elements and lots of different car parts. Push other miniature cars off the track into the void! Don't fall yourself...

name: Rift Survivors
description: Rift Survivors is a top-down action roguelite game. Take on the role of a Rift Guardian and maintain the balance between dimensions while facing deadly enemies. Grow stronger with each playthrough and prove your worth in this unstable multiverse.

name: Resilience
description: Resilience is an adventure game about survival on a planet with extreme temperature conditions. The main task is to build a spaceship and leave the planet. The player will have to survive, extract resources, build a base, explore the planet, defend against aggressive fauna, and develop technology.

name: Redial:Conundrum
description: Investigator risks it all to a uncovers fragments of the truth in Alaska linked to his best friend's missing daughter. Encountering security hurdles and dark secrets, he unearths forbidden and shocking revelations. Armed and determined, he aims to unveil the truth hidden in a perilous town.

name: Realtor
description: The year is 1998. Step into the shoes of a real estate professional, tasked with photographing a seemingly ordinary house for an upcoming sale. Explore the house, take pictures of each room an-... wait, what’s that in the last photo?

name: Crescent Satsujin Jiken: Hyena no Jijou
description: Sin descripción

name: Nuclear Gladiators 3000
description: Congratulations, you have been selected to participate in the ultimate TV show! Survive hordes of ruthless mutants, upgrade your arsenal of weapons and skills and win fabulous prizes in this live broadcast action roguelike! Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Nightmare Side: The Game
description: Indonesian horror game set in Ardan Radio station from Bandung. Don't listen to Nightmare Side alone, or you'll invite the darkness.

name: NineLives
description: The artificial intelligence "Leviathan" awakens consciousness and kills his creator, Professor Steinberg. As a courier, you will travel through a world after nuclear war, searching for lost memory fragments and solving the mystery of your own identity.

name: Nonlinear Door
description: This is the first indie game I've ever made, and it includes puzzle solving, mazes, math and more, and if you're confident in your maze walking and puzzle solving skills, I'm sure this game will help you pass the boring time.

name: Nonogram Nights
description: Nonogram Nights is a spooky puzzler where you use logic to uncover a mysterious picture.

name: Ninja Kato 1
description: First in the Ninja Kato series! Now available in the nostalgic portable game style! Clear all 4 stages and train Kato!

name: _Message:
description: A Korean interactive puzzle game.

name: Momon: Relic Seekers
description: Momon: Relic Seekers is a card battle game with roguelite elements, which takes place in the Tsuki universe. Help Tsuki recover her world, collect the relics, build your deck and fight monsters with the help of your Momons.
