name: Midnight Ramen
description: In "Midnight Ramen", you play the role of a ramen stall owner who interacts with customers coming and listens to their troubles. However, amidst helping the customers, there seem to be some matters in your own life as well..

name: Midnight Cemetery
description: A Dark Adventure with Total Freedom and Multiple Endings according to your Acts. Travel by car to a remote Village to investigate Rumors of a Cursed Cemetery that supposedly is Zombifying its dwellers. Explore and Investigate with Total Freedom. Your acts have irreversible consequences.

name: Ikoka Game
description: Dive into a world of puzzles and strategy suitable for all ages and genders. Enjoy simple rules, deep challenges, and a competitive scoring system. Ideal for quick gaming sessions.

name: Imaginary Friend Asylum
description: Imaginary Friend Asylum is a psychological horror game where you play a patient at Hathmoore Children's Asylum. Along the way, you'll befriend 7 other children and their imaginary friends. Together, you will uncover a dark conspiracy where you are to receive a fate worse than death.

name: Infinite White: Hyperbolic Time Chamber Simulator
description: A walking simulator game where you walk in a completely void and empty space, similar to a Hyperbolic Time Chamber.

name: Joy Life 3
description: Joy Life 3 is still a casual flop game. In the game, players need to find two cards with the same picture and successfully eliminate them. If the cards on the flop are inconsistent, the cards will not change. If they are the same picture, they will be eliminated.

name: Last Man
description: You're the sole survivor of a global virus that wiped out all men. In this apocalyptic world, your mission is to survive and foster intimate relationships with the most outstanding female survivors, sparking the resurgence of humanity in an epic adventure.

name: KunKunNight
description: This is a fictional story in which you will embark on a thrilling escape experience with a man named KunKun.The game contains scare elements. If you lack courage, please exit in a timely manner.

name: Kiken Drive: 2nd Lap
description: Accident and destruction and crash type public roads arcade racing game. Compete for time and damages.

name: Kingsgrave
description: Kingsgrave is an enchanting metroidvania adventure inspired by classic Zelda games. Assume the mantle of a resurrected king on a royal quest to rescue your subjects, restore the ruined kingdom, and rekindle its lost glory. The fate of the realm is in your hands.

name: Mendacium
description: Enter the prehistoric world dominated by primal reptiles. Fight through savage enemies and bosses with the combination of melee & ranged combat and elemental magic. Explore the vast handpainted world and try to prevent the meteor from wiping out all life on the planet.

name: Meet a Married Woman at a Hot Spring
description: This is a click game where you do naughty things with a married woman you meet at a hot spring.

name: Magic Escape
description: Join three adorable doggie companions in our enchanting escape puzzle game. Brew a witch's potion, uncover secrets, and have a spooktacular adventure together!

name: Little Survivors
description: Little Survivors is a short and accessible action rogue-lite, with an emphasis on simple but satisfying combat against monsters. Enter comic books, free animals, then use them to attack the vile Glurks!

name: Let's Be a Mouse
description: Let's Be a Mouse is a fun and engaging game that allows players to experience life through the eyes of a mouse.

name: Last Night Shift
description: Last Night Shift is a first-person horror game that creates a spooky atmosphere and tension. An ordinary night shift at a motel turns into a living nightmare.

name: Ice Fighter
description: Ice Fighter is a fast-paced Tower Defense-like game where you battle enemies, scavenge for resources, manage upgrades, and build defenses. Melt enemies during the night and plan your defense during the day.

name: House of Jigsaw: Vintage Revival
description: Relive the elegance of the past and embark the vintage charm in this expansion.

name: House of Jigsaw: Urban Lifestyle
description: Experience the pulse-pounding thrill of city life with House of Jigsaw: Urban Lifestyle DLC.

name: House of Jigsaw: The Best of Macro Photography
description: Dive into a realm where artistry and puzzle-solving intertwine with the House of Jigsaw: Digital Art Manipulation DLC.

name: House of Jigsaw: The Art of Still Life
description: Unleash your inner art connoisseur and embark on a journey through the captivating world of House of Jigsaw: The Art of Still Life DLC.

name: House of Jigsaw: Fascinating Landscapes
description: Escape into the serene yet treacherous world of natural wonders with the House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Nature DLC.

name: House of Jigsaw: Fantasy
description: Traverse through a variety of imaginative worlds, each offering its own set of magical Fantasy puzzles.

name: House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park
description: Experience the charm and vibrancy of a leisurely day outdoors with House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park DLC.

name: House of Jigsaw: Amazing Birds
description: Embark on an exhilarating avian adventure with House of Jigsaw: Amazing Birds DLC! Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant plumage, captivating habitats, and astonishing avian species.

name: House of Jigsaw: Beautiful Flowers
description: This DLC adds a burst of natural splendor to the House of Jigsaw universe, challenging you to test your puzzle-solving prowess in a garden of vibrant hues!

name: House of Jigsaw: Digital Art Manipulation
description: Immerse yourself in the boundless world of digital art manipulation in House of Jigsaw: Digital Art Manipulation DLC.

name: House of Jigsaw: Amazing Colors of the World
description: Unleash your inner puzzle maestro and dive into the multicolored landscapes of House of Jigsaw: Colors of the World DLC.

name: Holy War
description: Get rich in Holy War like in real life as you kill, trade, conquer, rule, discover and master dozens of units, heroes, pets, dungeons and mechanics in a non-existent MMORPG/RTS/Moba/City Builder hybrid that runs on BlockChain in a Giant World.

name: Eschatology
description: This is a snake like game with a pixelated style that is very attractive.

name: Extraktion 1943
description: Extraktion 1943 is a roguelite extraction shooter set in Nazi Germany. Survive as a stranded Allied soldier behind enemy lines. Take on the Nazis solo or online with friends, sabotage enemy production, assassinate high-ranking officers, and build your hideout and resistance network. Death to Hitler!

name: Fantasy Temptations
description: Fantasy Temptations is a captivating tile puzzle game set in a mystical anime world. Strategically arrange tiles to uncover enchanting characters and their intriguing stories. With every puzzle, the plot thickens. Dive into this fantastical journey today!

name: Farmieland
description: Sin descripción

name: Gem Wizard
description: Gem Wizard: Match gems, cast spells, and collect relics as you venture through a perilous dungeon. Battle fierce foes, build your wizard's power, and face the ultimate boss to save the realm. A fusion of puzzle-solving and RPG action!

name: Futa Tales
description: Futa Tales, Woo-oo! These ladies are packing heat! Explore the depths of Futa City, to uncover hidden tales of the taboo. When the clothes start flying off, prepare to get a whole lot more immersive!

name: Fury Race Survivor
description: Fury Race is a single player survivor-like racing roguelite auto-shooter. Gear up your car by arsenal of various weapons, take on hordes of walking dead and unlock powerful upgrades. Max your power and destroy mad riders of the wasteland!

name: Foxingdale: The Magical Stones of Kentaroo
description: Explore the Kingdom of Foxingdale in this retro CD-I action adventure game, 90s Anime aesthetics

name: Flying 'N Frying Popcorn Dude
description: With your trusty frying pan help Popcorn Dude as he embarks on a sky-high escapade to sate his insatiable appetite for candy! But watch out! Mischievous clouds and pesky little devils want to spoil the fun. Can you keep Popcorn Dude soaring high above the threats?

name: Fiora Arc
description: Go through the complex life of B as he struggles to balance his life between the island that calls to him, and fighting his way to the top of the gangs of Cardigan.

name: Fat Goblins
description: Prepare for goblin-packed, hat-stealing, and princess-fattening team based 16v16 combat! Siege the castle walls, rescue your pudgy princess, fatten up the enemy princess with delicious meat, unlock new hats & weapons, and kill each other repeatedly in silly and chaotic PvP war!

name: Frontier Ferris For Adventurers
description: This game is a real-time battle action game. Winning battles in an area earns experience and skill points. You can grow stronger by leveling up and acquiring skills from the skill tree. You can earn money by selling items and treasures obtained in battles and by completing requests.

name: Genkai: Primal Awakening
description: Combine tactics and strategy in this roguelike deckbuilder, where you must build your deck, train and evolve your team. Step into a mystical world where the Genkai battle in a quest for power and harmony, and prepare for the imminent arrival of the Primal Genkai.

name: HellFlame
description: HellFlame is a survival top-down arena auto-shooter where you play as a cyber angel wielding up to 6 weapons at a time to fight off hordes of demons. Collect lost souls, combine abilities, and watch demons die in one of the most massive and accurate physics systems ever created.

name: House of Jigsaw: Romance
description: Prepare for a puzzle-solving adventure that celebrates the enduring magic of love in a way that is truly unforgettable.

name: Don't Panic
description: Navigate through ever-changing mazes and outsmart inanimate pursuers. Trust your flashlight and compass, but never let your guard down!

name: Dracoslayer
description: Dracoslayer is a fighting game title with a heavy emphasis on elemental abilities and PvE action.

name: EscapeMono
description: Point & click to interact with strange creatures, find items, and solve puzzles in a dark, locked lab. Then just escape...?

name: Delator
description: Overcome your deepest nightmares and face your unavoidable fate. `Delator´ is a cosmic horror puzzle-platformer where you will play the role of a skittish doctor chosen by the cult of Delator to be the last sacrifice.

name: Digital Cities
description: The main idea of project is to explore the capitals and ordinary cities of the world, giving the user the opportunity to get into the atmosphere of new places and discover new corners of the planet with the help of RolePlaying game mode. Up your skills, go to work, trade, travel, all in one game.

name: Dirty Room: Chapter 9
description: After climbing up with a ladder, you finally saw Dr. Q, who seems to be awaiting you. And have made up your mind to go after Dr. Q immediately.

name: Divine Prophecy
description: A simple and refreshing flying shooting game.

name: Dig a Little Deeper
description: Dig, find valuable resources, and make your colony prosper in Dig a Little Deeper. An accident has taken your small group of colonists to an inhospitable and unknown planet. Only with your leadership and your management skills you will be able to build a new home. Let's start digging!

name: Definya
description: Easy Start, Endless Challenge: Begin with a beginner-friendly system that ensures a smooth learning curve. From novice to veteran, Definya's balanced gameplay offers a fulfilling experience.

name: DarkLight: Platformer
description: Welcome to the world of DarkLight: Platformer, where adventure and fun await you at every step. This exciting 2D platformer promises you an unforgettable journey through 150 unique levels and five diverse biomes.

name: Danny's Debt is Eternal
description: Danny's Debt is Eternal is a short, humorous adult game with fantastical H-scenes and plenty of eye candy. Help him replay the princess, and see how well he is rewarded!

name: CyberFall
description: CyberFall is an open-world survival game set in a post-apocalyptic Cyberpunk setting with base-building and crafting. Players fight to survive against new threats as well as each other.

name: Cupid: Roguelite
description: Cupid: Roguelite is an exciting 2D side-scrolling roguelite game that combines fast-paced action with strategic decision-making. In this world, you step into the shoes of Cupid. You must choose a target girl, and it's up to the Cupid helping you find your true love.

name: Culture Warz: Time's Up Karen! - War Tagz
description: Kill the zombies and collect their tagz. They won't be needing them after you're through with them!

name: Culture Warz: Time's Up Karen! - CTF
description: Take the flags back from the zombies before the timer runs out! Or you're eaten.

name: Culture Warz: Time's Up Karen! - KOTH
description: Defend The Thinker at all costs! He's the last intelligent creature out there!

name: Death's End
description:
You have died.

Death has some questions for you.

name: Moglin Punter
description: Flash game about kicking a cute little fuzzy creature around obstacles, monsters, bouncers, trampolines, etc... You have to grab cakes and cookies on an insane quest for the ultimate dessert.

name: Super D
description: Your objective is simple - Climb up the Tower of Dicedom, rescue your friends, eliminate Big D's hench dice, collect the faces of power and ultimately kill Big D at the top. Easy!

name: Muv-Luv: Teito Moyu - The Imperial Capital Burns
description: A Muv-Luv Alternative Total Eclipse prelude story released alongside the PC version of the Total Eclipse visual novel. It focuses on Takamura Yui's past during her days as a cadet for the Imperial Guard training school. Covering issues such as her interaction with her friends and allies, to her first battle against the BETA and the reason to her attachment to the Type-94C.

name: Music Tower
description:
Welcome to My Music Tower! Tap, Tap, Super Cute Piano Tycoon.
Play relaxing music with guitar and piano. It's simple but fun!
Decorate your tower with pretty & cute diorama brick items!
This game will heal your stressed mind comfortably.

You can play music easily just by tapping the tiles.

Build your lovely diorama brick tower.
You can decorate it anyway you would like.
Sweet dream tower decoration! Adorable game!

Start a concert with cats, kittens, dogs, baby sharks and little ghosts!
Please invite your party guests.
They will listen and applaud to your performance.

name: Crow Country
description: The year is 1990. Edward Crow has disappeared. The owner of 'Crow Country', he has not been seen since he unexpectedly shut down his park two years ago. The silence is broken when a mysterious young woman named Mara Forest ventures into the heart of the abandoned theme park in order to find him.

name: Hanging Gardens
description: Hanging Gardens is a single-level PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port that came out in August 2011. It was designed by Paul DeBruyne (skillsaw) and uses a music track from Epic Pinball. It's set in a lush, walled garden in the middle of a desert.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou + Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku Twin Pack
description: A double pack for Nintendo Switch that bundles the console version of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou and Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku.

name: Super Fighter M
description: A bootleg mobile action RPG featuring characters from various franchises where you collect your own team and start your legend adventure.

name: Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed - Free Update #1
description:
The first free update for Ghostbusters: Spirits Unleashed adds the MOROS Medical Facility map, the Glutton ghost type with 3 new ghosts, 2 new gadgets, the P.K.E. Meter: Ecto-Zapper attachment and the Ghost Swapping option that allows ghosts to change ghost type mid-match.

Alongside the general rebalancing and bug fixes it also adds a set of new customization options with Gear Shells to keep a visual look when using compatible gear, Morph Targets to change a character's face, new suit patches and cork board display in the Firehouse for them.

name: Spike's Water Balloons
description: Spike's Water Balloons. Spike returns in this Vectrex version of popular "Kaboom" and "Mad Bomber" style games of the early eighties !

name: Juegue Con Su Amstrad 01: Kart 3000
description:
This little game came in a standalone cassette as a free game with the first issue of the Spanish magazine "Juegue Con Su Amstrad", which roughly translates to "Play With Your Amstrad".

The aim is simple: shoot everything in sight for points. Just don't come in contact with anything, though. Just shoot, shoot, shoot!

name: Pac-Boy
description:
Wandering in a gigantic picture dotted with vitamins and deadly traps, Pacboy, a little red and yellow ball with legendary gluttony, is desperately searching for the secret passage leading to his fiancée Pacgirl, a prisoner of ghosts.

Published as a type-in listing in the magazine Micro Mag n° 1 (May 1989)

name: Magic Pinball
description: Released in 1987, this Spanish pinball game was developed and published by Omikron. Outside the review (and a page ad) on Issue 42 of MSX Extra, listing on MSX Games World and a post on Instagram by MSX Calamar, not much is known about this obscure game.

name: Mini MSX
description: As part of a SMS Power Coding Cometition in 2021, this homage to the iconic MSX computer line includes a Pac-Man clone, a shoot'em up and a racing game

name: Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann
description: The first Tengen Toppa Gurren Lagann mobile game is here! Produced by TRIGGER, this faithful adaptation will bring you back to the good old days of a drill's romance. Join forces with Team Gurren for an epic journey. The sky is the limit!

name: Super Mario World Master Quest Reborn
description: When Peach and Bowser share a magical cake, they fuse into Bowsette. Now Mario has to search the land of Grale to find the eight pieces of the Triforce to wish the enchantment away.

name: Solve The Case
description: Find out all details of the kidnapping through conversations with various people

name: Stress Relief Paintball
description: To get to the next level kill all the smiley faces.

name: Westwich Castle
description: Westwich Castle is a short indie horror game, in which you are a prisoner and have to escape the horrors lurking inside this dark abandoned medieval castle.

name: Warphouse
description: Warphouse is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and a source port that supports UDMF. It was released in November 2016 by Edward Cripps (Ed).

name: Prayers of Armageddon
description:
Prayers of Armageddon is a Doom II megawad created by Santtu Pesonen (MFG38). It includes 32 new maps and a hidden bonus map which is only accessible via using cheats. All the levels for the megawad were created entirely by Pesonen.
There was also a remake titled Prayers of Armageddon: Retaliation, and it was released in 2014.

name: Nuclear Bunker
description: Sprawling techbase exploration focused dungeon crawl with mostly low intensity combat (though there are a few set piece battles). This map was finished in 2007, but I hadn't released it because it was supposed to be part of a mini-episode that was never finished.

name: Secret Lab
description: A big level, the secret lab is a level by itself. You are instructed to destroy this enemy complex but there is a rumor that their notorious secret lab is hidden here so you cross your fingers and enter the complex. May God help you to find this lab and destroy it.

name: Fear Station Bravo
description: Tech-base themed map with non-linear design and alternative paths.

name: Temple of the Ancients
description: 5-level hub, set in a variety of environments. You start in a command center, but explore medieval and techno-medieval areas as you uncover the secrets of the Temple of the Ancients.

name: No Brakes
description: A large and difficult map influenced by Plutonia.

name: Sonic Advance 2 SP
description:
Sonic Advance 2 SP is a ROM hack geared at improving some of the less-loved aspects of Sonic Advance 2. Changes included: Adjusted enemy placements to prevent many ‘cheap shots’, such as item boxes bouncing you into enemies. Many bottomless pit areas were replaced with new routes or made harder to fall into at a moment’s notice. More plentiful Special Ring placement, allowing a more freeform approach to entering Special Stages, and Special Stage entry requirement reduced to 5 SP Rings.

Advance 2 is still a challenging game! Bosses haven’t been touched, and in the later half of the game you should expect plenty of enemies and the return of the dreaded bottomless pits. The hack attempts to balance things in a fair way but also rewards memorisation for repeat play and speedrunning - without as harsh a penalty for not doing so.

name: Gomorrah
description: Gomorrah ﻿is a GZDoom mapset consisting of 6 brand-new maps, powered by ukiro's amazing OTEX texture set. In Gomorrah, you'll be traversing three different locations - an abandoned mine/techbase, a medieval castle and a fortress in Hell - in search of three skull keys. Each skull key is going to be locked behind a puzzle which you'll have to solve. Once you have all three of them, you must use them to open a gate beyond which lies your final challenge.

name: Nevasca
description: Nevasca is an episode-format wad for zdoom source port, focusing on snow themes among with some ruins, hellish or techbase variants.

name: Twisted Joke
description: A Doom 2006 advent calendar map made by James "Phobus" Cresswell.

name: Smothered Hope
description: Single-player, Boom compatible map

name: Holoemblem: The Search for Seiso
description:
HoloEmblem: The Search for Seiso is a Hololive fan game and rom hack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones made with FEBuilder.

The game has 56 playable characters across 40 chapters, 10 are optional, in a unique story with in-game cutscenes.

name: Wicked Be The Ways of Men
description: This map is different from most other maps in that the player progresses differently through the map depending on the skill level. Each skill level "starts" the map at a different location, and some of the traps are skill-level specific. Additionally, the keys and weapons are at different locations for the different skill levels, and there are some areas that are only accessible to specific skill levels.

name: Temple of Lust
description: A map designed for Torn's Doom Advent Calendar 2005 day 3

name: Radial Ascension
description: Fairly simple map set in a cave/cavern themed place designed for Torn's Doom Advent Calendar 2005 day 14.
